i1.name: Harrier
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''{{ci|Valor}}''' marks a nearby visible enemy as {{color|#FFD300|Vulnerable}}, {{tip|sight|revealing}} them for 4 seconds. Enemies hit by {{ai|Blinding Assault|Quinn}}, {{ai|Vault|Quinn}} or {{ai|Skystrike|Quinn}} will also be marked as {{color|#FFD300|Vulnerable}}.

'''Quinn's''' next [[basic attack]] against a {{color|#FFD300|Vulnerable}} target consumes the mark and deals {{pp|10 to 95|color=physical damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|16 to 50}} AD)}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.

''Harrier'' is placed on cooldown when the passive mark ends, or the mark is overwritten by an ability. An active ability mark will disable the next ''Harrier'' mark, then end with a 1-second cooldown before ''Harrier'' is enabled.
''Harrier'' is disabled while {{ai|Behind Enemy Lines|Quinn}} is active.
i1.notes:
* ''Harrier's'' targeting priority:
*# Last unit hit (if it was a small minion it appears to select a different target).
*# Lowest-health enemy champion.
*# Lowest-health enemy minion.
* An ability mark will visually incur the short cooldown upon marking, but this does not prevent abilities from marking.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** {{tip|critical strike|Critical strikes}} do not interact with ''Harrier's'' bonus damage.
* ''Harrier'' is consumed even if it is parried, the attack is negated in any case.
* ''Harrier'' does not target enemy [[structures]].
* '''Quinn's''' attacks that are already in-flight will trigger and consume the ''Harrier'' mark.
* {{ai|Vault|Quinn}} applies a mark even if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.

q1.name: Blinding Assault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' signals '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to fly forward in a line, stopping upon colliding with an enemy, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies and applying {{tip|nearsight}} to the target for {{fd|1.75}} seconds, reducing their {{tip|sight}} radius to {{tt|330 units|Estimated}}.
Non-[[champion]] targets are {{tip|disarm|disarmed}} instead for the same duration.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 50% AP)

w1.name: Heightened Senses
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Attacking a {{ai|Harrier|Quinn|Vulnerable}} target grants '''Quinn''' {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' orders '''{{ci|Valor}}''' to {{tip|sight|reveal}} the area around her for 2 seconds.

effects.levelingtext:
{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 80}}%}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|20 to 40}}%}}
effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %

  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

e1.name: Vault
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Quinn''' {{tip|dashes}} to the target enemy, {{tip|airborne|knocking them back}}, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}, and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 50% which decays over {{fd|1.5}} seconds, before {{tip|dash|leaping back}} and landing 525 units away from them.
e1.notes:
* '''Quinn''' will automatically attempt to attack the target once she completes ''Vault''.
* The target will turn to face the opposite direction after being {{tip|airborne|knocked back}}.
* Unlike its constant cast range ''Vault's'' bounce's can vary to allow '''Quinn''' to close or to make a gap between herself and the target (depending on casting position) or even to jump through a wall (if there is enough landing room on the other side).
* '''Quinn''' will track and follow the target if they move through {{tip|dash|dashes}} and {{tip|blink|blinks}}.
** This will not occur if the target is travelling to a very far distance (e.g, {{si|Recall}}, {{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Stand United|Shen}}).
* The target will be marked as {{color|#FFD300|Vulnerable}} even if the {{tip|dash}} is interrupted.
* ''Vault'' can prevent an {{tip|unstoppable basic attack}} from affecting their target (the empowered attack is not consumed however).{{Bug}}
